titles.title: Integrating uncertainty and risks in energy-saving projects implementation

record.abstract: In order to record and assess uncertainty degree and risks arising from implementation of energy-saving measures the author suggests risks diversification, considering separately traditional and specific risks. First ones are typical for all investment projects while second are unique and tied to the energy-saving projects only. Attention to specific risks allows more accurate calculating of energy-saving projectsâ€™ efficiency purposing making management decisions. Specific risks are available for assessment with the expert estimations method.
